content.rendered:
Play Deadswitch 3 : Side-Scrolling Multiplayer Shooter Game

Deadswitch 3 is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter. Experience action-packed combat with hundreds of weapons and multiple solo and team-based game modes. Recent Reviews: Mostly Positive (47) – 70% of the 47 user reviews in the last 30 days are positive.

Deadswitch 3 unblocked is a Fast-Paced Action Game

Play ranked games with other players online or set up your own local games against bots. Customize your character, custom classes, and killstreaks. Unlock new gear as you progress through the ranks!

Free Shooting Game and Online Action Games to Play for Free

An action game where you will be competing against enemies on a server or trying to complete many different missions. This is a free online Shooting game brought to you by Armor Games.

Controls :

Mouse – Shooting, WASD keys – Movement, ESC – Menu, Spacebar – Jump, SHIFT – Sprint, CTRL – Crouch, E – Interaction, R – Reload, Q – Change weapon, V – Melee attack, Z – Special attack

You can play Deadswitch 3 in your browser

However, the full version offers:

  • Better and faster game performance
  • Absolutely no advertisements
  • Automatic game updates
  • Exclusive in-game content
  • High quality game files
  • Unique character customizations
  • Additional Survival modes and Operation missions
  • Prestige mode
  • Multiplayer player icons
